title: The Protestant religion truely stated and justified by the late Reverend Mr. Richard Baxter ; prepared for the press some time before his death ; whereunto is added, by way of preface, some account of the learned author, by Mr. Danel Williams and Mr. Matthew Sylvester.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: An answer to: The touchstone of the reformed Gospel / Matthew Kellison.
First ed., edited by Williams and Sylvester. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Contents is lacking in filmed copy. Pages 170-end photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy and inserted at the end.
